net.trajano.doxdb

Class IndexView

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.doxdb.IndexView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class IndexView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This represents a view of the data that will be stored in the index.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • collection

        private java.lang.String collection

      • doxID

        private DoxID doxID
        Associated DoxID that was used to populate the view.

      • index

        private java.lang.String index
        Defines the index that will store this data view. The purpose is to allow multiple indices to co-exist and prevent accidental views from another index. Underneath it all it is still one table. The value will be stored in "_index" field.

      • masked

        private boolean masked
        Flag to indicate that the data should be masked. If the data is masked, the ID and URLs should not appear in the search results.

      • numbers

        private final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigDecimal> numbers
        Holds numeric data.

      • strings

        private final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> strings

      • text

        private final java.lang.StringBuilder text

      • texts

        private final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> texts

      • setString

        public IndexView setString(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String stringValue)
        Strings are not broken up into tokens and must be exact match. The original text is stored in the index.
        Parameters:
        name - field name
        stringValue - string value
        Returns:
        this

      • setText

        public IndexView setText(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String textValue)
        Text are broken up into tokens. The original text is not stored in the index.
        Parameters:
        name - field name
        textValue - text value
        Returns:
        this
